snippet: Wall Street was lower on Wednesday after the release of the Federal Reserve’s policy statement and the Fed’s chairwoman’s news conference.
abstract: Stocks fall after Federal Reserve chairwoman Janet L Yellen raises possibility of an earlier-than-anticipated increase in interest rates next year.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street was lower on Wednesday after the release of the Federal Reserve’s policy statement and the Fed’s chairwoman’s news conference.

headline.main: Yellen’s Signal on Rate Increases Causes a Slide
headline.print_headline: Yellen’s Signal on Rate Increases Causes a Slide
